overview: A masked maniac with a penchant for a monster-themed board game is playing his own twisted game with the women of a small American town. Each time the dice are rolled, another victim meets a grisly end. Returning home to mourn the death of her murdered sister, Keegan befriends local cop Roger and reclusive cinema projectionist Billy â€” but soon finds herself in the killer's sights.
tagline: Only he will hear your scream!
title: Deadly Games
